        <div class="sm-12 lg-8">
            <div class="message-text A-TYP16R-RW-ALL"><p>HSBC will never ask customers to contact third-party insurance companies via SMS links or phone numbers. <h2 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="pp_tools_heading_4">
    Expecting tax season? Take out a HSBC Personal Instalment Loan and enjoy privilege benefits
</h2>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_5" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">From 6 February 2025 to 10 March 2025, successfully apply to enjoy a preferential APR as low as 2.05%<sup><a href="#fn-loans-lowannualisedrateoffer" data-back-link-connected=""><span aria-hidden="true">3</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Footnote link 3</span></a></sup>, rebates of up to $18,000<sup><a href="#fn-loans-hkd4500-rebate-offer" data-back-link-connected=""><span aria-hidden="true">4</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Footnote link 4</span></a></sup>.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/content/dam/hsbc/hk/vam/pdf/2024_10_PIL_W10_Online_TnC_CPA_1030_R1.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Terms and conditions</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Terms and conditions  This link will open in a new window</span></a> apply.</p>
</div></div>

    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>The monthly repayment amount, Annualised Percentage Rate (APR) and total interest amount shown in the calculator are for indication only and not meant to be final.</li>
 <li>The rates for individual customers may vary. Please call our hotline, or log on to HSBC Online Banking or HSBC HK Mobile Banking app to enquire about your eligible rates including APR and repayment information.</li>
 <li>The illustration does not reflect the actual allocation of principal and interest. Please also note that the actual monthly repayment amount may differ, customers should refer to the loan confirmation letter for the actual related information.</li>
 <li>The monthly repayment amount and the APR is calculated based on a 6, 12, 18, 24, 30, 36, 42, 48, 54 or 60-month repayment period and loan amount of every HKD10,000. The monthly repayment amount is rounded up to one decimal place.</li>
 <li>The APR is calculated using method specified in relevant guidelines issued by The Hong Kong Association of Banks, and is rounded up or down to the nearest two decimal places. An APR is a reference rate, which includes all applicable interest rates, fees and charges of the product, expressed as an annualised rate.</li>
 <li>View <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/loans/personal-instalment-loan/key-facts-statement.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Key Facts Statements</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Key Facts Statements  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</li>
 <li>Terms and conditions apply.</li>
</ul>

<h3 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="pp_main_heading_9">

</h3>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_7" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>To be eligible for HSBC Personal Instalment Loan, you must:</p>
<div class="commonMark-list">
<ul role="list">
<li>be a Hong Kong resident</li>
<li>be at least 18 years old</li>
<li>have a monthly income of at least HKD5,000</li>
</ul>
</div>
 <p></p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Annual Fee</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Not applicable</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Handling Charge</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Subject to promotional offer</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Early Redemption Penalty</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">2% of outstanding principal amount plus repayment of any applicable promotional offers</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Deferred Payment</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Deferred Payment (for 1st repayment): 2.25% per month on approved loan amount, calculated on daily basis</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Late Charge</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">2.25% per month calculated on daily basis for amounts in arrears, plus HKD400 on each instalment due to insufficient funds</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Unauthorized Overdraft Handling Charge</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Not applicable</p>
</div></div>

<h2 class="heading A-TYP28L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="pp_main_heading_10">

</h2>

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_15">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-66-33  ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_25" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="pp_main_accordion_3" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_5" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="faq-1"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-417183621__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-417183621__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How much should I borrow? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-417183621__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_16">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_26" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_9" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">That depends on two key factors: how much you need to borrow, and how much you can afford to repay.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">It's best to borrow only what you actually need and resist the temptation of borrowing extra money. Remember, your loan does not have to be for a round figure! You can usually borrow the exact amount you need.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">It's also wise to look at all your other expenses while working out how much you can afford to repay. Try not to spend more than 30% of your gross monthly income on all your loan repayments, with the possible exception of mortgage repayments which may be up to 50% of your income. That way, you can better ensure that you can afford the extra cost of loan repayments without worrying that you can't meet other financial commitments.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_6" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="faq-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-229100359__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-229100359__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How long should I borrow for? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-229100359__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_17">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_27" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_10" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A good general rule is to avoid borrowing for longer than the life of what you're paying for. For example, if you have an annual expense such as a tax bill, aim for a loan of 12 months of less. Otherwise, you'll still be paying off your first loan when the next year's tax demand arrives.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">By budgeting carefully, you can balance the loan amount, loan period, and amount you can afford to repay each month.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_7" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="faq-3"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1044234437__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1044234437__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What's the difference between a Personal Instalment Loan and a Revolving Credit Facility? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1044234437__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_18">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_28" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_11" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A Personal Instalment Loan lets you repay the whole loan amount in regular monthly amounts within a fixed repayment period. This might help you manage your finances more easily.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A Revolving Credit Facility provides you with a revolving credit limit on standby. That means you could withdraw a loan within the limit whenever you want. There is no fixed monthly repayment amount or repayment period. You'll only be charged interest based on the amount you withdraw.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_8" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="faq-4"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1100939368__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1100939368__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Will I save on interest expenses by repaying my Personal Instalment Loan early? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1100939368__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_19">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_29" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_12" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Generally, the earlier you make your loan repayment, the more you'll save on outstanding interest payments. But you should consider early repayment charges before you decide whether or not to pay off your loans early.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We use the 'Rule of 78' (also known as the 'straight-line method') to calculate the interest and principal proportion in each monthly repayment. While your monthly repayment amount remains the same throughout the loan tenor, more interest will generally be included in earlier repayments than principal. That means the amount of outstanding interest is likely to be small if you've been making repayments as scheduled for some time.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you choose to pay off the loan early, you may lose more than you gain because the amount of interest saved may not be enough to cover any charges for an early repayment. If you're considering an early repayment, you can contact us to check the total amount you'll need to pay, including the outstanding loan balance, early repayment charges and other fees, and outstanding interest. This way, you can compare and make an informed decision on whether to go ahead with the early repayment.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    

</div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM links" role="region">
<div>

<h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL text-container text ">
    
    
        
        Notes

</div>
            
            
            <ol class="A-TYPS6R-RW-DEV footnotes-list without-bottom-padding"><li><div id="fn-loans-withdrawin1min" tabindex="-1">Applications have to be submitted during the Bank's service hours (Mondays to Fridays: 9:00am to 8:00pm, Saturdays: 09:00am to 5:00pm, Sundays and public holidays: 12:00pm to 12:00am), or individual branch's opening hours) with all required information (including without limitation a valid HSBC banking account number) and documents. The actual turnaround time starts when all the required information is successfully input into the Bank's application evaluation system and the Bank may provide the instant application result and fund disbursement. Processing time may vary in some cases depending on the actual circumstances of individual applications. </div></li><li><div id="fn-loans-minimumredraw" tabindex="-1">Minimum redraw amount is HKD3,000 and you must have had a Personal Instalment Loan account for at least 3 months. The Bank reserves the final right of allowing customers to redraw or not and has sole discretion to determine the redrawn amount and tenor. </div></li><li><div id="fn-loans-lowannualisedrateoffer" tabindex="-1">Only applicable to selected customers who successfully apply for and draw down an approved loan of HK$1,500,000 or above during the promotional period which starts on 6 February 2025 to 10 March 2025 (the "Promotional Period"). For a repayment period of 12 months, the monthly flat rate is 0.11% and the Annualized Percentage Rate (APR) is 2.47% (without any cash rebate and RewardCash) or 2.05% (taking into account HK$2,000 cash rebate and $1,300 RewardCash under Successful Application Offer). The APR is calculated using method specified in relevant guidelines issued by The Hong Kong Association of Bank and is rounded up or down to the nearest two decimal places. An APR is a reference rate, which includes all applicable interest rates, fees and charges of the product, expressed as an annualized rate. For your eligible rates, please call our hotline <a rel="noopener noreferrer" href="tel:+852-2748-8080" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2748 8080</a>, log on to HSBC Online Banking or the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app for details. The interest rate that will apply and the amount of interest that will be charged are calculated based on the approved Loan amount and the repayment period. If your Loan application cannot fulfil our credit requirement, the Bank may still process your application on a case-by-case basis, but the interest rate, handling fee, repayment period and/or promotional offer may be adjusted. The Bank will inform you on the finalised Loan details. If you accept the Loan details, we will credit the Loan into your repayment account according to normal procedure. </div></li><li><div id="fn-loans-hkd4500-rebate-offer" tabindex="-1">For offer and promotional details, please refer to <a rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/content/dam/hsbc/hk/vam/pdf/2024_10_PIL_W10_Online_TnC_CPA_1030_R1.pdf">terms and conditions</a>. </div></li><li><div id="fn-loans-introrate" tabindex="-1">For the first 3 months' introductory interest rate period, interest rate is 2.90% p.a. and Annualised Percentage Rate (APR) is 2.92% for all approved credit limits. To be eligible for an introductory interest rate of 2.90% p.a. (Annualised Percentage Rate of 2.92%) for all approved credit limits of the Loan for the first 3 months (being the period from the date of Loan disbursement to the third statement date of the respective account), you must not hold or obtain any approved Revolving Credit Facility from us for the past 12 months immediately preceding your Loan approval date; and you must submit a Loan application and obtain the approval of the Loan during the promotional period. For interest rate (p.a.) following the first 3 months, APR and your applicable interest rate, please call our hotline 27488080 or log on to HSBC HK App. The APR is calculated using method specified in relevant guidelines issued by The Hong Kong Association of Banks, and is rounded up or down to the nearest two decimal places. An APR is a reference rate, which includes all applicable interest rates, fees and charges of the product, expressed as an annualised rate. </div></li></ol>
